creator: ognjen.d.blagojevic@gmail.com
text: File bin/cpappend.bat seems to be needless. It is not called from any other script in bin/ directory. I assume it was used as a helper script to create classpath dynamically, but that is not necessery any more.

creator: ognjen.d.blagojevic@gmail.com
text: It seems that cpappend.bat was called in jasper.bat in 5.5.x series. It is not used anymore in 6.0.x and later.
Done in trunk by r1572574 . This change will be in 8.0.4.
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
